snippet.title: Borderlands 2 Launch Date Trailer
snippet.description:
Borderlands 2 kicks off a new era of Shoot and Loot on September 18th in the US and September 21st Internationally!

Pre-order the game and gain access to the Borderlands 2 Premiere Club which allows you to download awesome in-game items.  To find out more on how to pre-order please visit http://www.borderlands2.com/preorder.


Come hang out on the Official Borderlands Forums - http://gbxforums.gearboxsoftware.com/
Follow us out on Twitter - http://www.twitter.com/gearboxsoftware
Follow our publisher on Twitter - http://www.twitter.com/2KGames
Like us on Facebook - http://www.facebook.com/BorderlandsGame


Rating Pending
